law.text: Persons or associations of persons hereby designated "underwriters" not heretofore authorized, are authorized to transact any insurance, except life, title, or mortgage guaranty insurance in this state, on the Lloyd's plan, by executing articles of agreement expressing their purpose so to do and complying with the requirements set forth in this code.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 93, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 28, sec. 1, effective June 18, 1970.
